net.corda.testing.dsl

Interface LedgerDSLInterpreter<T extends TransactionDSLInterpreter>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    OutputStateLookup, Verifies
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LedgerDSL, TestLedgerDSLInterpreter

    public LedgerDSLInterpreter<T extends TransactionDSLInterpreter>
extends Verifies, OutputStateLookup

    This interface defines the bare bone functionality that a Ledger DSL interpreter should implement.

    TODO (Kotlin 1.1): Use type synonyms to make the type params less unwieldy

    • Method Detail

      • _transaction

        WireTransaction _transaction(java.lang.String transactionLabel,
                             TransactionBuilder transactionBuilder,
                             Function1<? super T,? extends net.corda.testing.dsl.EnforceVerifyOrFail> dsl)

        Creates and adds a transaction to the ledger.

        Parameters:
        transactionLabel - Optional label of the transaction, to be used in diagnostic messages.
        transactionBuilder - The base transactionBuilder that will be used to build the transaction.
        dsl - The dsl that should be interpreted for building the transaction.
        Returns:
        The final class WireTransaction of the built transaction.

      • _unverifiedTransaction

        WireTransaction _unverifiedTransaction(java.lang.String transactionLabel,
                                       TransactionBuilder transactionBuilder,
                                       Function1<? super T,Unit> dsl)

        Creates and adds a transaction to the ledger that will not be verified by Verifies.verifies.

        Parameters:
        transactionLabel - Optional label of the transaction, to be used in diagnostic messages.
        transactionBuilder - The base transactionBuilder that will be used to build the transaction.
        dsl - The dsl that should be interpreted for building the transaction.
        Returns:
        The final class WireTransaction of the built transaction.
        See Also:
        Verifies.verifies

      • _tweak

        void _tweak(Function1<? super net.corda.testing.dsl.LedgerDSLInterpreter<? extends T>,Unit> dsl)

        Creates a local scoped copy of the ledger.

        Parameters:
        dsl - The ledger DSL to be interpreted using the copy.

      • attachment

        SecureHash attachment(java.io.InputStream attachment)

        Adds an attachment to the ledger.

        Parameters:
        attachment - The InputStream defining the contents of the attachment.
        Returns:
        The class SecureHash that identifies the attachment, to be used in transactions.
